consent.functional.label: Functional Consent
consent.functional.description: Purpose: Core error monitoring and basic functionality. Rationale: Essential for the core purpose of error monitoring and doesn't collect personal data unnecessarily. Controlled parameters: auto_session_tracking, capture_unhandled_rejections, breadcrumbs_console, breadcrumbs_dom, capture_console, capture_xhr, capture_fetch, before_breadcrumb, basic error handling integrations.

consent.analytics.label: Analytics Consent
consent.analytics.description: Purpose: Performance monitoring, metrics collection, and detailed analytics. Rationale: Performance data collection for optimization purposes, similar to Google Analytics. Controlled parameters: enable_performance, traces_sample_rate, enable_profiling, profiles_sample_rate, enable_tracing, enable_long_task, enable_INP, enable_CLS, enable_LCP, enable_FID, enable_TTFB, enable_FCP, instrument_navigation, instrument_page_load, instrument_xhr, instrument_fetch, auto_instrument.

consent.marketing.label: Marketing Consent
consent.marketing.description: Purpose: Session recording, user behavior tracking, and marketing insights. Rationale: Session replays and detailed user interaction tracking are primarily used for understanding user behavior and improving UX/marketing. Controlled parameters: enable_replay, replay_sample_rate, replay_on_error_sample_rate, mask_all_text, mask_all_inputs, block_all_media, network_capture_body, network_request_headers, network_response_headers, capture_click_events, capture_key_events.

consent.preferences.label: Preferences Consent
consent.preferences.description: Purpose: User-specific configurations and personalized experiences. Rationale: These settings affect how personal information is handled and how the monitoring experience is personalized. Controlled parameters: send_default_pii, initial_scope_user, initial_scope_tags, initial_scope_contexts, framework-specific integrations (react_profiler, vue_warn_handler, etc.), custom breadcrumb filtering and user context.
